location.sjis: ボスタフ工房 ディックル村支部

dialogue.sjis: この忙しいときに、ザックの野郎 実家に帰りやがった
dialogue.ascii: Just as when we have so much to do! That brat Zakk's parents took him back home!

dialogue.sjis: こないだのケガで親が心配して 呼び戻されたっていうけどよ
dialogue.ascii: The kid's parents took him back BECAUSE of his injury, y'know

dialogue.sjis: 鍛冶職人の修行なめてんのかって 言ってやりてぇよ、けど
dialogue.ascii: You think Craftknightship is a joke to you?! Is what I oughta say, but

dialogue.sjis: 俺の親なんて そんな心配してくれねぇよ
dialogue.ascii: Hell, not even my own parents worry about me that much
